00044 class DzTSortedArray {

00048     //

00058     // MANIPULATORS
00059     //
00060

00067     DataType&       at( int i ) { return m_items[i]; }
00068     int             add( const DataType obj );
00069     void            removeByIndex( int index, int num = 1 );
00070     void            removeFromEnd( int num = 1 );

00079     //

00082     const DataType& at( int i ) const { return m_items[i]; }
00083 
00084     int             count() const { return m_nItems; }
00085     bool            isEmpty() const { return (m_nItems < 1); }
00086     int             getSize() const;
00087     int             find( const DataType obj ) const;
00088     bool            findIndex( const DataType obj, int &index ) const;
00089     const DataType* getValues() const { return m_items; }
00090     DataType*       getValuesUnlocked() const { return m_items; }
00091     void            setGrowSize( int num ) { m_blockGrowSize = num; }

00093

00105 /******************************************************************************/
00106 template <class DataType>
00107 DzTSortedArray<DataType>::DzTSortedArray( int bSize ) : m_blockGrowSize( bSize ),
00108     m_nItems( 0 ), m_items( NULL ), m_nSlots( 0 )
00109 {
00110     if( m_blockGrowSize <= 0 ){
00111         DZ_WARNING( "Invalid block size specified in DzTSortedArray::DzTSortedArray()" );
00112         m_blockGrowSize = 1;
00113     }
00114 }

00149 /******************************************************************************/
00150 template <class DataType>
00151 DzTSortedArray<DataType>::~DzTSortedArray()
00152 {
00153     if( m_items )
00154         dzFree( (void*) m_items );
00155 }

00157 /******************************************************************************/
00158 template <class DataType>
00159 DzTSortedArray<DataType>& DzTSortedArray<DataType>::operator=( const DzTSortedArray<DataType> &from )
00160 {
00161     int i, *ptr;
00162 
00163     clear();
00164     if( m_nSlots < from.m_nSlots )
00165         addSpace( from.m_nSlots - m_nSlots );
00166 
00167     m_nItems = from.m_nItems;
00168 
00169     m_blockGrowSize = from.m_blockGrowSize;
00170     for( i = 0, ptr = m_items; i < m_nItems; ++i, ++ptr )
00171         m_items[i] = from.m_items[i];
00172 
00173     return *this;
00174 }
00175 
00176 /******************************************************************************/
00177 template <class DataType>
00178 DzTSortedArray<DataType>& DzTSortedArray<DataType>::operator=( const DzTArray<DataType> &obj )
00179 {
00180     const DataType  *items = obj.getValues();
00181     int             count = obj.count();
00182 
00183     if( m_nItems < count )
00184         addSpace( count - m_nItems );
00185 
00186     m_nItems = count;
00187 
00188     memcpy( m_items, items, sizeof( DataType ) * count );
00189 
00190     sort();
00191 
00192     return *this;
00193 }
00194 
00195 /******************************************************************************/
00196 template <class DataType>
00197 DzTSortedArray<DataType>& DzTSortedArray<DataType>::operator=( const DzTBlockArray<DataType> &obj )
00198 {
00199     int             count = obj.count();
00200 
00201     if( m_nItems < count )
00202         addSpace( count - m_nItems );
00203 
00204     m_nItems = count;
00205 
00206     obj.copyToArray( m_items );
00207 
00208     sort();
00209 
00210     return *this;
00211 }

00214 template <class DataType>
00215 DzTSortedArray<DataType>& DzTSortedArray<DataType>::operator=( const DzTSimpleArray<DataType> &obj )
00216 {
00217     const DataType  *items = obj.getValues();
00218     int             count = obj.count();
00219 
00220     if( m_nItems < count )
00221         addSpace( count - m_nItems );
00222 
00223     m_nItems = count;
00224 
00225     memcpy( m_items, items, sizeof( DataType ) * count );
00226 
00227     sort();
00228 
00229     return *this;
00230 }

00232 /******************************************************************************/
00233 template <class DataType>
00234 DataType& DzTSortedArray<DataType>::operator[]( int i )
00235 {
00236     if( i < 0 || i >= m_nItems ){
00237         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTSortedArray::operator[]" );
00238         return m_items[0];
00239     }
00240 
00241     return m_items[i];
00242 }
00243 
00244 /******************************************************************************/
00245 template <class DataType>
00246 int DzTSortedArray<DataType>::add( const DataType obj )
00247 {
00248     int     index;
00249     bool    alreadyHere;
00250 
00251     // Find the slot that this item should be inserted at.
00252     alreadyHere = findIndex( obj, index );
00253     if( alreadyHere )
00254         return index;
00255 
00256     if( m_nItems >= m_nSlots )
00257         addSpace( m_blockGrowSize );
00258 
00259     // Insert the item into the list at the right index.
00260     memmove( &(m_items[index+1]), &(m_items[index]), ( m_nItems - index )
00261         * sizeof( DataType ) );
00262     m_items[index] = obj;
00263     m_nItems++;
00264 
00265     return index;
00266 }
00267 
00268 /******************************************************************************/
00269 template <class DataType>
00270 void DzTSortedArray<DataType>::removeByIndex( int index, int num )
00271 {
00272     if( index < 0 || index >= m_nItems ){
00273         DZ_WARNING( "Index out of range in DzTSortedArray::removeByIndex()" );
00274         return;
00275     }
00276 
00277     if( index + num > m_nItems ){
00278         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for remove in DzTSortedArray::removeByIndex()" );
00279         num = m_nItems - index;
00280     }
00281 
00282     memmove( &(m_items[index]), &(m_items[index+num]), ( m_nItems - index - num )
00283         * sizeof( DataType ) );
00284     m_nItems -= num;
00285 }
00286 
00287 /******************************************************************************/
00288 template <class DataType>
00289 void DzTSortedArray<DataType>::removeFromEnd( int num )
00290 {
00291     if( num > m_nItems ){
00292         DZ_WARNING( "Too many items specified for remove in DzTSortedArray::removeFromEnd()" );
00293         num = m_nItems;
00294     }
00295 
00296     m_nItems -= num;
00297 }
00298 
00299 /******************************************************************************/
00300 template <class DataType>
00301 bool DzTSortedArray<DataType>::remove( const DataType obj )
00302 {
00303     int result = find( obj );
00304     if( result < 0 )
00305         return false;
00306 
00307     removeByIndex( result );
00308 
00309     return true;
00310 }
00311 
00312 /******************************************************************************/
00313 template <class DataType>
00314 void DzTSortedArray<DataType>::setCount( int num )
00315 {
00316     if( num < 0 ){
00317         DZ_WARNING( "Count less than 0 specifed in DzTArray::setCount()" );
00318         num = 0;
00319     }
00320 
00321     preSize( num );
00322     m_nItems = num;
00323 }
00324 
00325 /******************************************************************************/
00326 template <class DataType>
00327 void DzTSortedArray<DataType>::preSize( int num )
00328 {
00329     if( num < 0 ){
00330         DZ_WARNING( "Count less than 0 specifed in DzTArray::preSize()" );
00331         num = 0;
00332     }
00333 
00334     if( num > m_nSlots ) {
00335         if( ( num - m_nSlots ) > m_blockGrowSize )
00336             addSpace( num - m_nSlots );
00337         else
00338             addSpace( m_blockGrowSize );
00339     }
00340 }
00341 
00342 
00343 /******************************************************************************/
00344 template <class DataType>
00345 void DzTSortedArray<DataType>::freeUnusedMemory()
00346 {
00347     if( m_nItems < m_nSlots ) {
00348         DataType *newItems = (DataType*) dzMalloc( m_nItems * sizeof( DataType ) );
00349 
00350         // Make sure the memory allocation was successful.
00351 
00352         memcpy( newItems, m_items, m_nItems * sizeof( DataType ) );
00353         if( m_items )
00354             dzFree( (void*) m_items );
00355         m_items = newItems;
00356         m_nSlots = m_nItems;
00357     }
00358 }

00360 /******************************************************************************/
00361 template <class DataType>
00362 int DzTSortedArray<DataType>::find( const DataType obj ) const
00363 {
00364     int     index;
00365 
00366     bool exists = findIndex( obj, index );
00367 
00368     return exists ? index : -1;
00369 }
00370 
00371 /******************************************************************************/
00372 template <class DataType>
00373 int DzTSortedArray<DataType>::getSize() const
00374 {
00375     return m_nSlots * sizeof( DataType );
00376 }
00377 
00378 /******************************************************************************/
00379 template <class DataType>
00380 bool DzTSortedArray<DataType>::addSpace( int num )
00381 {
00382     int         i;
00383     int         newSize;
00384     DataType    *ptr;
00385 
00386     newSize = m_nSlots + num;
00387     DataType *newItems = (DataType*) dzMalloc( newSize * sizeof( DataType ) );
00388 
00389     m_nSlots = newSize;
00390 
00391     for( i = 0, ptr = m_items; i < m_nItems; ++i, ++ptr )
00392         newItems[i] = *ptr;
00393     if( m_items )
00394         dzFree( (void*) m_items );
00395     m_items = newItems;
00396 
00397     return true;
00398 }
00399 
00400 /******************************************************************************/
00401 template <class DataType>
00402 bool DzTSortedArray<DataType>::findIndex( const DataType obj, int &index ) const
00403 {
00404     int     left = 0, right = m_nItems - 1, x;
00405 
00406     while( right >= left ) {
00407         x = left + ( right - left ) / 2;
00408         if( m_items[x] == obj ) {
00409             index = x;
00410             return true;
00411         }
00412         if( obj < m_items[x] )
00413             right = x - 1;
00414         else
00415             left = x + 1;
00416     }
00417     index = left;
00418     return false;
00419 }
00420 
00421 /******************************************************************************/
00422 template <class DataType>
00423 void DzTSortedArray<DataType>::sort()
00424 {
00425     int         i, ir, j, k;
00426     DataType    rra;
00427     DataType    *items = m_items;
00428 
00429     if( m_nItems < 2 )
00430         return;
00431 
00432     // Have to do this because the Numerical Recipes algorithms are all 1-based
00433     // instead of the C-standard 0-based.
00434     --items;
00435 
00436     k = (m_nItems >> 1) + 1;
00437     ir = m_nItems;
00438 
00439     // The index k will be decremented from its initial value down to 1 during the hiring (heap
00440     // creation) phase. Once it reaches 1, the index ir will be decremented from its initial value
00441     // down to 1 during the retirement-and-promotion (heap selection) phase.
00442     for( ;; ) {
00443         if( k > 1 ) // Still in hiring phase.
00444             rra = items[--k];
00445         else { // In retirement-and-promotion phase.
00446             rra = items[ir]; // Clear a space at end of array.
00447             items[ir] = items[1]; // Retire the top of the heap into it.
00448             if( --ir == 1 ) {
00449                 // Done with the last promotion.
00450                 items[1] = rra; //The least competent worker of all!
00451                 break;
00452             }
00453         }
00454         // Whether in the hiring phase or promotion phase, we here set up to sift down
00455         // element rra to its proper level.
00456         i = k;
00457         j = k + k;
00458         while( j <= ir ) {
00459             if( j < ir && items[j] < items[j+1] )
00460                 j++; // Compare to the better underling.
00461             if( rra < items[j] ) {
00462                 // Demote rra.
00463                 items[i] = items[j];
00464                 i = j;
00465                 j <<= 1;
00466             }
00467             else
00468                 break; // Found rras level. Terminate the sift-down.
00469         }
00470         items[i] = rra; // Put rra into its slot.
00471     }
00472 }
